DOC.brief_summary: The main objective if to evaluate the sparing effect of dexmedetomidine on the doses of propofol and remifentanil.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Dexmedetomidine on a Closed-Loop Anesthesia System
DOC.criteria: male patients scheduled for a general anesthesia age lower than 18 years allergy to propofol, or to soja or to peanuts, or to sufentanil, to remifentanil, or to morphine,or to a myorelaxant or to an excipient, hypersensibility to sufentanil, or to remifentanil, or to other derivate of fentanyl, history of central nervous system disease, patients receiving a psychotropic treatment or an agonistantagonist opiate, hypovolemic patients, patients receiving a cardiovascular treatment, expected bleeding surgical procedure, simultaneous general and locoregional anesthesia, severe hepatic insufficiency.
